title: Bringing K/V context quantisation to Ollama
dot:
digraph KV_Context_Quantisation{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor="#f9f9f9", fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];Introduction[label="Introduction
To K/V Context Cache Quantisation", shape=ellipse, fillcolor="#cce5ff"];KV_Quantisation_Why[label="Why K/V Context Cache Quantisation Matters
• Run Larger Models
• Expand Context Sizes
• Reduce Hardware Utilisation", shape=rect, fillcolor="#e0f7fa"];Memory_Savings[label="Memory Savings
• F16: 6GB
• Q8_0: 3GB (50% Saving)
• Q4_0: 2GB (66% Saving)", shape=rect, fillcolor="#f0f4c3"];Interactive_Tool[label="Interactive VRAM Estimator
For Model, Context Size, Quantisation Level", shape=rect, fillcolor="#fce4ec"];Implementing[label="Enabling K/V Context Quantisation in Ollama
• Flash Attention
• Set Quantisation (Q8_0)
• Use Environment Variables", shape=rect, fillcolor="#dcedc8"];Limitations[label="Implementation Limitations
• No Modelfile Quantisation
• No API Support
• Cannot Mix K and V Quant Levels", shape=rect, fillcolor="#f8bbd0"];Compatibility[label="Compatibility
• Requires Flash Attention
• Supported Hardware (Apple, Nvidia, AMD)", shape=rect, fillcolor="#e1bee7"];Journey[label="The Journey to Integration
• 5 Months of Development
• Integration with llama.cpp", shape=rect, fillcolor="#c8e6c9"];Challenges[label="Challenges
• Explaining Concept
• Merge Conflicts
• Code Refactoring", shape=rect, fillcolor="#ffccbc"];Successes[label="Successes
• PR Merged
• Testing and Feedback
• Community Support", shape=rect, fillcolor="#b3e5fc"];Definitions[label="Definitions
• LLM, vRAM, Quantisation, Q8_0, Q4_0", shape=rect, fillcolor="#fff9c4"];Not_Included[label="What wasn’t Included in the PR
• Extra Quant Levels
• Modelfile Configuration", shape=rect, fillcolor="#ffeb3b"];Reporting[label="Reporting Issues
• Bug Tracking in Ollama and llama.cpp
• Community Discussions", shape=rect, fillcolor="#d1c4e9"]; Introduction->KV_Quantisation_Why;KV_Quantisation_Why->Memory_Savings;KV_Quantisation_Why->Interactive_Tool;KV_Quantisation_Why->Implementing;Implementing->Limitations;Limitations->Compatibility;Journey->Challenges;Journey->Successes;Successes->Definitions;Successes->Not_Included;Successes->Reporting; Further_Reading[label="Further Reading

• PR and Blog Links", shape=rect, fillcolor="#e8f5e9"];Reporting->Further_Reading;}
